originalTitle: From Hollywood to the homeland: Why African countries are courting black American stars
title: From Hollywood to the homeland: Why African countries are courting black American stars
content: Ciara and Samuel L Jackson are among the big names who have become citizens of African countries in recent years.

originalTitle: Zambian leader backs traditional Ghanaian outfit after online trolling
title: Zambian leader backs traditional Ghanaian outfit after online trolling
content: Some Zambians outraged Ghanaians by describing the outfit worn by their president as a "blouse".

originalTitle: 'They sent a letter asking to preach. Then they massacred us' - Nigerians on jihadist attack
title: 'They sent a letter asking to preach. Then they massacred us' - Nigerians on jihadist attack
content: Armed jihadists devastate a community that refused to convert to their hard-line interpretation of Islam.

originalTitle: Italy says cannot join Trump’s ‘Board of Peace’ because of constitution
title: Italy says cannot join Trump’s ‘Board of Peace’ because of constitution
content: Under constitution Italy cannot join because power would be wielded by one leader standing above other members.

originalTitle: Suryakumar rescues India as United States threaten T20 World Cup upset
title: Suryakumar rescues India as United States threaten T20 World Cup upset
content: India recover from 77-6 as captain Suryakumar Yadav hits an unbeaten 84 in 29-run World Cup win against United States.

originalTitle: Super Bowl drives economic boon in the US ahead of game
title: Super Bowl drives economic boon in the US ahead of game
content: The football game will bring as much as $630m in local economic impact to the San Francisco Bay Area.

originalTitle: US wants Russia and Ukraine to end war by June, says Zelensky
title: US wants Russia and Ukraine to end war by June, says Zelensky
content: The Ukrainian leader says difficult issues remain, as Russia carries out further strikes on energy facilities.

originalTitle: General shot in Moscow conscious after surgery, Russian media say
title: General shot in Moscow conscious after surgery, Russian media say
content: Lt Gen Vladimir Alexeyev was shot several times inside his apartment block on Friday morning.

originalTitle: Trump says he 'didn't see' part of video with racist clip depicting Obamas as apes
title: Trump says he 'didn't see' part of video with racist clip depicting Obamas as apes
content: The US president says he "didn't make a mistake", adding he had only seen the beginning of the video before it was posted.

originalTitle: How 'irresponsible' captain Romero's week ended in 'perfect storm'
title: How 'irresponsible' captain Romero's week ended in 'perfect storm'
content: Thomas Frank admits Tottenham captain Christian Romero's week ended in a "perfect storm" with a red card at Manchester United.

originalTitle: Yamal scores as Barcelona beat Mallorca to extend lead at top
title: Yamal scores as Barcelona beat Mallorca to extend lead at top
content: Lamine Yamal scores again as Barcelona beat Mallorca 3-0 to extend their lead at the top of La Liga to four points.

title: Celtic 'perfect fit' as Oxlade-Chamberlain signs
content: Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain says Celtic is the "perfect fit" for him after joining the Scottish champions on a deal to the summer.
